forecast-period.text: Clear. Winds southerly 15 to 20 km/h.

Sunny. Areas of frost in the south in the early morning. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light in the morning then becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching the low 20s.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:30am to 3:20pm, UV Index predicted to reach 6 [High]
Mostly sunny. Areas of frost in the southeast in the early morning. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 4 with daytime temperatures reaching the low to mid 20s.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 7 and 10 with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 20s.

Cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers. Light winds becoming west to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to around 5 with daytime temperatures reaching around 19.
Clear. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Mostly sunny. Areas of frost in the early morning. Winds southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light before dawn then becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 20.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:40am to 3:00pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]

Mostly sunny. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the southwest at night. Areas of frost in the early morning. Light winds becoming northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning then turning north to northwesterly in the late morning. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching between 19 and 22.

Partly cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming westerly 20 to 30 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 17 and 23.

Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Winds westerly 15 to 20 km/h increasing to 20 to 30 km/h during the day then turning southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to around 6 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 17.
Clear. Light winds becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the evening.

Partly cloudy. Areas of frost in the early morning. Light winds becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the evening then becoming light in the late evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching between 17 and 21.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:30am to 2:50pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]
Partly cloudy. Areas of frost in the early morning. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching the low 20s.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds north to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h shifting westerly 15 to 25 km/h during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to around 7 with daytime temperatures reaching the mid to high 20s.

Cloudy. Medium (40%) chance of showers, most likely in the evening. Winds westerly 15 to 20 km/h increasing to 15 to 25 km/h during the day then turning southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 5 with daytime temperatures reaching around 18.
Clear. Winds southeast to southwesterly 20 to 30 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Areas of frost and patchy fog in the early morning. Winds southeast to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h becoming light early in the morning then becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 17.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:40am to 2:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning frost. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light before dawn then becoming north to northeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the middle of the day. Overnight temperatures falling to around 2 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 20.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the evening. Winds north to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h shifting westerly 15 to 20 km/h during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to around 7 with daytime temperatures reaching the low to mid 20s.

Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Snow possible above 900 metres. Light winds becoming westerly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to around 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 17.
Clear. Light winds becoming southeast to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late evening.

Partly cloudy. Patchy fog in the early morning. Areas of morning frost. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the far south during the afternoon. Snow possible above 1400 metres. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between zero and 4 with daytime temperatures reaching between 10 and 19.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:30am to 2:40pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]
Mostly sunny. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 21.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds northeast to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h tending northwest to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then tending northwest to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 3 and 6 with daytime temperatures reaching between 17 and 25.

Cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Snow possible above 900 metres. Light winds becoming west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the morning then becoming light during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to around 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 19.
Partly cloudy. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h.

Cloudy. Areas of frost in the north in the early morning. Slight (20%) chance of morning drizzle near the Otways. Winds southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light in the late evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 16.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:50am to 3:00pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]

Partly cloudy. Areas of frost in the north in the early morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the west in the late afternoon and evening. Light winds becoming northerly 15 to 20 km/h in the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to around 3 with daytime temperatures reaching around 18.

Partly cloudy. Medium (60%) chance of showers in the afternoon and evening. Winds northerly 15 to 20 km/h turning westerly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between 6 and 9 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 20.

Cloudy. High (80%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Snow falling above 800 metres. The chance of a thunderstorm in the afternoon and evening, with possible hail in the south. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 20 km/h tending west to southwesterly during the day. Overnight temperatures falling to around 5 with daytime temperatures reaching around 13.
Partly cloudy. Winds south to southeasterly 20 to 30 km/h.

Partly cloudy. Areas of morning frost near the Yarra Valley. Slight (20%) chance of drizzle in the west in the morning. Winds south to southeasterly 15 to 25 km/h tending east to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 3 and 6 with daytime temperatures reaching between 11 and 15.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:40am to 2:50pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]

Mostly sunny. Areas of morning frost about the ranges. Winds east to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h tending east to northeasterly early in the morning then tending northwest to northeasterly in the middle of the day. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 16 and 19.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the afternoon and evening. Winds north to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h increasing to 30 km/h before shifting westerly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to around 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 19 and 23.

Cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Snow falling above 800 metres. The chance of a thunderstorm in the south in the evening with possible hail. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending west to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 4 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 16.
Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a light shower near Wilsons Promontory. Winds easterly 15 to 20 km/h becoming light in the evening.

Cloudy. Areas of frost in the early morning. Patchy fog in the early morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower about the ranges during the afternoon. Snow possible above 1400 metres. Light winds. Overnight temperatures falling to between 1 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 10 and 15.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:40am to 2:20pm, UV Index predicted to reach 5 [Moderate]

Mostly sunny. Areas of frost in the south in the early morning. Light winds becoming east to northeasterly 15 to 25 km/h early in the morning. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 5 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 18.

Partly cloudy. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the evening. Light winds becoming north to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the morning then tending northwest to southwesterly during the afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between 3 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 18 and 25.

Cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Snow falling above 900 metres. The chance of a thunderstorm in the southwest in the evening with possible hail. Winds west to northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending west to southwesterly during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 4 and 7 with daytime temperatures reaching between 12 and 19.
Mostly clear. Slight (20%) chance of a light shower near the coast. Light winds.

Cloudy. Areas of morning frost about the ranges. Slight (30%) chance of a shower in the afternoon and evening. Snow possible above 1400 metres. Light winds becoming south to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the middle of the day then becoming light in the late afternoon. Overnight temperatures falling to between minus 1 and 5 above zero with daytime temperatures reaching between 10 and 16.
Low-Moderate
Sun protection 9:40am to 2:20pm, UV Index predicted to reach 4 [Moderate]

Partly cloudy. Patchy fog in the early morning. Slight (20%) chance of a shower in the far east in the early morning. Light winds becoming northeast to southeasterly 15 to 20 km/h in the late afternoon then tending northwest to northeasterly in the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 3 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 13 and 18.

Partly cloudy. Slight (20%) chance of a shower. Winds northerly 15 to 20 km/h tending northwesterly 15 to 25 km/h during the day then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 2 and 8 with daytime temperatures reaching between 18 and 25.

Cloudy. High (70%) chance of showers, most likely in the afternoon and evening. Snow falling above 1100 metres. Winds northwest to southwesterly 15 to 25 km/h tending southeast to southwesterly 15 to 20 km/h during the afternoon then becoming light during the evening. Overnight temperatures falling to between 4 and 10 with daytime temperatures reaching between 14 and 19.
